price: I njih će stići kazna zato što su nepravedni bili, pa neće moći ni riječ izustiti.
arabic: وَوَقَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَيۡهِم بِمَا ظَلَمُواْ فَهُمۡ لَا يَنطِقُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wawaqaʿa al-qawlu ʿalayhim bimā ẓalamū fahum lā yanṭiqūna
